evs.metric.parameters
Class ReferenceForecastParameter

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.parameters.ReferenceForecastParameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetricParameter
public class ReferenceForecastParameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricParameter

Stores the identifier of a reference forecast used in a skill calculation.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

hasRefForecast

public boolean hasRefForecast(java.lang.String ref)
Returns true if the input string equals the reference forecast identifier, false otherwise, including if either the input or the existing reference are null.

Parameters:
ref - the reference forecast identifier
Returns:
true if the input equals the existing (non-null) reference

isSampleClimatology

public boolean isSampleClimatology()
Returns true if the reference forecast has been set and matches the sample climatology string in ForecastTypeParameter.SAMPLE_CLIMATOLOGY_STRING, false otherwise.

Returns:
true if the only reference forecast is sample climatology, false otherwise
